Motion City Soundtrack comes to RPI
Posted on 03 May 2008 in scrapbook and performances

My freshman-year roommate is a huge fan of Motion City Soundtrack. So, when she found out that they were coming to the RPI Field House, she became the happiest person in the world. I went to the concert with her and even got them to sign my program after the show.

This was also my first real rock concert, and Ryan even went with me. :)
